bibl.title: Hecataeus of Abdera and Theophrastus on Jews and Egyptians.
bibl.note: 1. M. Stern, The Chronological Sequence of the First References to Jews in Greek Literature, pp. 159-163 [traduction d'un article paru en hébreu dans: Zion 1970]. - 2. O.
